task.title: How to Acquire Seeds
task.shortdesc: Before crops can be planted, you must have seeds for the appropriate crop. There are three methods for acquiring seeds, here you will learn how to acquire seeds from shops.

step.cmd: Walk to Pierre's General Store or Joja Mart and right-click the door to enter

Approach Pierre or the cashier, but stay behind the counter. If you approach Pierre from the same side of the counter, you will start a dialogue, or give him a gift rather than accessing the shop catalogue.
Right click on Pierre or the cashier to bring up his shop catalogue.
Scroll in the catalogue to find and select the plants you wish to grow.
step.info: Tip: If you hover over the seed you can see the growing details, such as what season you can plant the crop in, and how long it will take to grow.

step.cmd: Right-click to purchase one packet of seeds. Each packet will grow one plant of that type.
step.info: Tip: You can buy multiples of 5 by holding Shift + right- or left-click, multiples of 25 by holding Control + Shift + right- or left-click, or a full stack of 999 by holding Control + Shift + 1 + left-click. Once you click, the money will automatically leave your inventory.
